name: Spinner
description: A loading indicator that provides visual feedback during asynchronous operations. Automatically respects reduced motion preferences.

accessibility.screenReader: Announced as a status with the provided label. Uses role=status to announce loading state without interrupting user.

recommendedUsage: Use to indicate loading state during data fetching, form submissions, or other async operations. Combine with aria-busy on parent containers.
antiPatterns: Do not use without a meaningful label. Do not show indefinitely without context or timeout. Do not use multiple spinners in close proximity.
